name: Bee Services Web & Mobile Solutions
tagline: Fostering the startup spirit of your company
description:
Bee Services is a mix between Indian, Chilean and Polish developers. We founded our business by a need to help companies to implement new business ideas. We are the tech arm you need to success.
Our main dish is working with startups to design and develop good products using the latest technologies like:
React Js & Native
Angular & Backbone
Laravel, Rails & NodeJs
UX & UI
HTML & CSS
Android (Java) & iOS (Swift)
We will prepare your next team. Everything's start with web & mobile development, but we deeply understand the importance of being part of your team.
Most of our clients decide to hire part of our team after completing the project. Hey!, we are here to help you.
READ MORE...
